segments.text: Miss Wang , how do you do ? I ’ m Allan James , the director of human recourse department of this company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do , Mr . James ? Thank you for asking me to come in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . Please sit down , then we can begin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you know , Miss Wang , we are looking for an executive secretary with business background and good English skills . We looked into your resume and thought you might be a good candidate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Today ’ s interview is for us to get to know a little about you . And the interview will last a little bit longer . So , if you ’ re comfortable , I want to ask you some questions .
segments.speaker: S1
